name: Lousy Load
description:
Atomy has a new job on a space platform.
He has to stabilize one of the power stations so it won't blow up.

The power station displays its current load and you have to add the correct particles on time.

Let's hope the salary is worth it...

Controls:

Alt/Z/K (A Button): Shoot proton

K/X (B Button): Shoot electron

Download the file and play it on the go!

This game was developed by Maro Schmidt.
